The EGSnrc C++ class library

Report PIRS-898

Iwan Kawrakow, Ernesto Mainegra-Hing, Frederic Tessier and Blake Walters

EGSnrc C++ user codes

  • cavity, a fully featured EGSnrc C++ user code for ion chamber simulations
  • egs_chamber: In-phantom ion chamber simulations
  • egs_fac: Free Air Chamber (FAC) correction factors calculations
  • egs_cbct: CBCT/CT scanner simulations



Note If you use the EGSnrc C++ class library (or any code that uses it), please cite this report as I. Kawrakow, E. Mainegra-Hing, F. Tessier and B.R.B. Walters, The EGSnrc C++ class library, NRC Report PIRS-898 (rev A), Ottawa, Canada, 2009. The egs_chamber documentation was prepared based on J. Wulff's user-manual (unpublished) and the section about positioning-induced dose uncertainties and the corresponding input example were graciously contributed by H. Bouchard.
